manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Not All Toothpastes are the Same Even if you take great care of your teeth, you may not be protecting yourself against Acid Erosion. Acid Erosion damages your tooth enamel, changing the shape, texture, and healthy appearance of your teeth. Everyday protection is everything when it comes to protecting against Acid Erosion. ProNamel toothpaste is specially designed to keep your enamel stronger and better protected from the effects of Acid Erosion every day.

The Causes of Acid Erosion Your everyday diet can put your teeth at risk and this can happen more easily than you’d expect. In fact, up to 1 in 3 young adults ages 18-35 are at risk of Acid Erosion.* Coffee, wine, soda, and surprisingly healthy choices, like fruit, fruit juices, sparkling water with lemon, and even some salad dressings can damage tooth enamel. As few as four acidic “occasions” throughout the day can put our enamel at risk from Acid Erosion * Bourgeois, D. et al. Is Dental Erosion and Dentine Hypersensitivity a Public Health Problem: Rationale of the European Collaborative Study. Presented at 101st FDI Annual World Dental Congress, 28 – 31st August 2013, Istanbul, Turkey.

The Effects of Acid Erosion Even if our teeth look healthy today, they can be at risk from these 5 effects: 1. Weakness – The acids in everyday food and drink can weaken enamel, making it easier to wear away. 2. Thinness – As more enamel wears away, teeth can become visibly thinner. 3. Transparency – As the enamel thins, the edges of your teeth can appear transparent or see-through. 4. Yellowing – As weakened enamel is worn away, more yellow dentine layer underneath can become visible. 5. Dullness – As enamel wears away, your teeth may lose their shine.

ProNamel Toothpaste ProNamel toothpaste has unique optimized-fluoride formulations that actively strengthens acid-softened enamel. ProNamel toothpaste also helps to prevent further enamel from dissolving. The toothpaste has been specially designed for people for risk of Acid Erosion. Helps protect enamel against the effects of Acid Erosion Helps restore natural whiteness Cleans effectively Freshens breath Helps protect against cavities

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: it's fine it's a mouthwash.a little expensive for the amount. tastes fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Sensitive Teeth
reviews.reviewText: Sensodyne mouthwash is perfect for folks with sensitive teeth or gums. No pain and light minty flavor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This brand works to keep teeth in good shape. Taste great and does not burn mouth. Can only get at Amazon cause our stores do not sell it. Dentist recommended and we sticking with it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricey, but good
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash has a nice spearmint flavor and doesn't burn like some. It was recommended to me by my dentist so even though it's a bit expensive, I figured I'd try it. I can't say I've noticed any improvement regarding the sensitivity of my teeth, but it is far more pleasant than many other mouthwash brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Product in foreign language/damaged
reviews.reviewText: I hate to write negative reviews but was quite confused as to my purchase. When arrived I realized it was in some other language I cannot read, as well as the top having looked damaged. I don’t feel safe using this product that isn’t in the language shown in the photos before purchasing. I also don’t trust the top being damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good mouthwash, but too pricey for how small it is.
reviews.reviewText: The bottle is a bit too small for the price. You'd be spending a lot of money buying it regularly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really works well for sensitive teeth!! Thax for great product!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this mouthwash!
reviews.reviewText: I wore off all my enamel by rinsing with peroxide (yes, I know, I'm an i***t). Found this mouthwash, which actually works, active ingredient is xylitol, a form of sugar extracted from birch trees. So far so good - it's preventing acid erosion!

I don’t have the most sensitive of teeth and gums, but every time I’ve tried to use other branded mouth wash in the past it has left my teeth beyond sensitive, and my gums feeling as though they’re raw. But after using this mouthwash I can luckily say that I haven’t had any problems, I was hesitant on purchasing because of using other brands “sensitive teeth” mouth washes, but this one has definitely done it’s job and has done it well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Really does what it says on the tin
reviews.reviewText: This is a really fantastic mouthwash. I’m an octogenarian and have used this for some years now. My teeth keep white and not yellowing, so it’s really working on my enamel! Most other mouthwashes are too hot for my sensitive teeth, but not this. Also I have no sensitivity after using Sensodyne Pronamel toothpaste and mouthwash every day! It’s worth every penny as nothing usually needs doing on dentist visits either!Too thick (NO) what rubbish is that, it’s just a liquid like any other mouthwash!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 26, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic mouthwash. I have tried several mouthwashes, and this is by far the best. Mild taste so it doesn’t burn. Fresh breath. Mouth feels very fresh and clean. Slightly thick texture which is also nice as it foams and really helps make my teeth feel cleaner. Will most certainly keep using/buying this product. Looking to protect enamel and this cane highly recommended by my Dentist.

reviews.reviewTitle: I like this mouthwash very much
reviews.reviewText: Wish the bottle was bigger considering the price. Despite the size and price, I like this mouthwash very much!
Product came in a different language. I prefer to be able to read the label.
